title: Michael Hedges Compilation of 7 Albums.
description:
7 Albums from the late great guitarist Michael Hedges 
Tragically he died in a car accident 1997.
His music lives on. 

Go to www.nomadland.com to support the fund for his children and to visit the Michael Hedges website.

Albums:
Aerial Boundaries (1984)
LIVE 5-2005 Remastered By FiveElements
LIVE 6-2005 VOL 2 Remastered by Five Elements
Live On The Double Planet (1987)
Strings of Steel  (1993)
The Best Of Michael Hedges (2000)
The Road To Return (1994)
